data.eml:eml: Elisesione, a new name for Wesenbergia Hartman, 1955, and the description of a new species (Annelida, Hesionidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Salazar-Vallejo, Sergio I. (2016): Elisesione, a new name for Wesenbergia Hartman, 1955, and the description of a new species (Annelida, Hesionidae). ZooKeys 632: 1-12, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.632.9652, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.632.9652
